explanations.reason: The paper focuses on numerical simulations of Hodgkin-Huxley-type equations and biochemical models to study synapse loss and synchrony in neurons using the NeuroBox toolbox. It does not mention any machine learning techniques, neural networks (in the context of deep learning), or any of the other specified keywords related to machine learning or artificial intelligence. The study is centered around biophysical simulations and computational neuroscience rather than machine learning methodologies.
